imdb.plot outline: Betrayal is an exceptional Human emotion. Just like happiness, Love, sorrow, anger- we are prone to this vulnerability too. Ask yourself, haven't you betrayed ever. No, it's not always has to be the flesh. We have the inclination to be vengeance for happiness, contentedness, gratification - the love. But if this love drives you outrageously to commit a crime, going against your own beloved, that's where it becomes a crime in the eyes of bunch of hypocrites- The Society. Checkmate is a story inspired by real incidents, where in the protagonist Aryan falls in his own trap, the law karma reincarnates itself in the present situation where in he not only gets retribution from his childhood love Shruti. It is said that Truth is nothing but web of lies the character of Meera avenging for her lust helping Neel to find the main culprit behind this twisted tale.
imdb.title: Checkmate: sheh aur maat

But if this love drives you outrageously to commit a crime, going against your own beloved, that's where it becomes a crime in the eyes of bunch of hypocrites- The Society. Checkmate is a story inspired by real incidents, where in the protagonist Aryan falls in his own trap, the law karma reincarnates itself in the present situation where in he not only gets retribution from his childhood love Shruti.
